member.name: ICMP_ERROR_INFO
member.summary: Used to store received ICMP error information.

member.name: ICMP_ERROR_INFO.srcaddress
member.summary: The source IP address of the ICMP error.

member.name: ICMP_ERROR_INFO.protocol
member.summary: The protocol of the ICMP error (either IPPROTO_ICMP or IPPROTO_ICMPV6).
